Class Board

java.lang.Object
  AbstractGrid<E>
      BoundedGrid<Piece>
          Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Grid<Piece>
public class Board
extends BoundedGrid<Piece>

Board represesents a rectangular game board, containing Piece objects.

Version:
May 3, 2017
Author:
Cay Horstmann, Anu Datar, Alex Yu

Method Detail

allMoves

public ArrayList<Move> allMoves(Color color)
Retrieves all possible moves that the given color player can make.

Parameters:
color - the color player to check
Returns:
all possible moves that the player can make

executeMove

public void executeMove(Move move)
Executes the given move by moving the piece to the correct location.

Parameters:
move - the given move to make

undoMove

public void undoMove(Move move)
Undo the previous move.

Precondition:
move has already been made on the board
Postcondition:
piece has moved back to its source, and any captured piece is returned to its location
Parameters:
move - the last move made
